The second part of the sanctuary of a troubled soule. Newly enlarged by Io. Hayvvard Sanctuarie of a troubled soule. Part 2 Hayward, John, Sir, 1564?-1627.
[23], 229, [21] leaves
Printed by I. W[indet] for Cuthbert Burbie, London : 1607.
Printer's name from STC. Probably issued with STC 13005, the first part. Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
